
# This is INACTIVE config file that contain example rules for Apache server.

# --- Deny Index Access --- #

Options All -Indexes

# --- Remove WWW From Domain Name --- #

RewriteEngine On
RewriteBase /
RewriteCond %{HTTP_HOST} ^www\.(.*)$ [NC]
RewriteRule ^(.*)$ http://%1/$1 [R=301,L]

# --- Custom Error Pages --- #

ErrorDocument 404 /assets/errors/404.php
